title: Margarita with a Straw
writer: Shonali Bose, Nilesh Maniyar, Atika Chohan
short_cast: Kalki Koechlin, Revathy, Sayani Gupta, Kuljeet Singh, Malhar Khushu, Hussain Dalal, Tenzin Dalha, William Moseley
cast: Kalki Koechlin, Revathy, Sayani Gupta, Kuljeet Singh, Malhar Khushu, Hussain Dalal, Tenzin Dalha, William Moseley
genre: LGBTQ Movies, Dramas, Independent Movies, Romantic Movies
desc: An Indian woman with cerebral palsy decides to study in New York, where she begins a life-changing romance with a female activist who is blind.
